title: How to Make a Teddy Bear Birth Certificate

methods.name: Make Birth Certificate by using MS Word Templates

steps.headline: Do Search and download professional birth certificate template.
steps.description:
By Word Templates Online: (http://www.wordtemplatesonline.com/2014/01/birth-certificate-template/){"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/af\/Birth-certificate-from-save-word-templates-01.png\/460px-Birth-certificate-from-save-word-templates-01.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/af\/Birth-certificate-from-save-word-templates-01.png\/760px-Birth-certificate-from-save-word-templates-01.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":262,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":433.24175824175825,"licensing":"

steps.headline: Download teddy bear birth certificate template.
Open in MS Word 2007 or latest version and do customization.
Print your certificate.
steps.description:
Click file menu then print or use (ctrl+p) for shortcut. Select your printer and mention number of copies. Click "ok" or press "Enter"{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/2e\/Print-birth-certificate-template.png\/460px-Print-birth-certificate-template.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/2e\/Print-birth-certificate-template.png\/760px-Print-birth-certificate-template.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":246,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":406.0989010989011,"licensing":"

steps.headline: Get a sheet of paper.
steps.description: Any type of sheet will do.

steps.headline: With your pencil, fill in the following information:
steps.description: Name:       ( their name here)  Birth Date:     (date of purchase here)  Place Of Birth:    (where bought/where made here)  Characteristics:  ( their characteristics here)

steps.headline: Fill in the name line with the teddy's name, then a birth date, and finally, hobbies and interests for it.
Show it to your teddy, and put it up on your bedroom wall!
Go to a word processor.
steps.description: Use whatever steps you need for your word processor to make it "landscape" instead of "portrait".

steps.headline: Switch to a fancy font, relatively large font size, and make sure your lines are centered on the page.
steps.description: At the top line, write "Teddy Bear Birth Certificate".

steps.headline: On the next few lines, spaced out however you wish, write: "This certifies that __________ was born and adopted by ___________ at the (your country) Teddy Bear Hospital on the date of ____/____/20____.
Then, with one line for each and a space (This -> _____) after each one, write the following characteristics: Height, Weight, Fur color, Eye color, Gender.
Add a place for your signature.
steps.description: Then, on the last few lines write something like "Congratulations! Please love your teddy and give it a home!"

steps.headline: Decorate!
steps.description: If you have access to a color printer, you can make the font different colors!

text:
Make Birth Certificate by using MS Word Templates Do Search and download professional birth certificate template. By Word Templates Online: (http://www.wordtemplatesonline.com/2014/01/birth-certificate-template/){"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/af/Birth-certificate-from-save-word-templates-01.png/460px-Birth-certificate-from-save-word-templates-01.png","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/af/Birth-certificate-from-save-word-templates-01.png/760px-Birth-certificate-from-save-word-templates-01.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":262,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":433.24175824175825,"licensing":"

"} Download teddy bear birth certificate template. Open in MS Word 2007 or latest version and do customization. Print your certificate. Click file menu then print or use (ctrl+p) for shortcut. Select your printer and mention number of copies. Click "ok" or press "Enter"{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2e/Print-birth-certificate-template.png/460px-Print-birth-certificate-template.png","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2e/Print-birth-certificate-template.png/760px-Print-birth-certificate-template.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":246,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":406.0989010989011,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Make Handmade Birth Certificate Get a sheet of paper. Any type of sheet will do. With your pencil, fill in the following information: Name: ( their name here) Birth Date: (date of purchase here) Place Of Birth: (where bought/where made here) Characteristics: ( their characteristics here) Fill in the name line with the teddy's name, then a birth date, and finally, hobbies and interests for it. (e.g. cooking, sports, watching TV, etc.) Show it to your teddy, and put it up on your bedroom wall! Decorate the certificate! (optional) Make a Hand-Typed Birth Certificate Go to a word processor. Use whatever steps you need for your word processor to make it "landscape" instead of "portrait". Switch to a fancy font, relatively large font size, and make sure your lines are centered on the page. At the top line, write "Teddy Bear Birth Certificate". On the next few lines, spaced out however you wish, write: "This certifies that __________ was born and adopted by ___________ at the (your country) Teddy Bear Hospital on the date of ____/____/20____. Then, with one line for each and a space (This -> _____) after each one, write the following characteristics: Height, Weight, Fur color, Eye color, Gender. Add a place for your signature. Then, on the last few lines write something like "Congratulations! Please love your teddy and give it a home!" Decorate! If you have access to a color printer, you can make the font different colors!
